title: Account Transfer
body:
A friend of mine want to transfer his account to my server(from russia to EUW) and for some reason there is no option to transfer, i can't find any information on weather it is a bug or this feature has been removed.
on the FAQ it says exactly how to transfer but in the client there is no option where it points.
https://tinyurl.com/y7zejc72

replies.body: Transfers have been disabled as we get ready for end of season rewards.  It should be back up on November 20!
